name: Centerline Aviation
about: Centerline Aviation is a premier flight school dedicated to shaping the next generation of skilled pilots. With locations in Kansas and North Carolina, we offer comprehensive flight training programs, including private, instrument, commercial, and multi-engine certifications. Our expert instructors, certified as CFI, CFII, and MEI, provide top-notch education and training in a variety of aircraft, from piston singles and twins to turbo props and jets. We utilize technically advanced airplanes and partner with Gold Seal Ground School for comprehensive ground school courses. Our flexible programs cater to both aspiring professional pilots and recreational flyers, emphasizing personal development, career opportunities, and a passion for aviation. At Centerline Aviation, your success is our mission, and we are committed to helping you achieve your flying dreams.
